name: .MMRC File Extension
summary: Learn about .MMRC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an MMRC file in MADRIX using the MIDI Remote Editor. To open an MMRC file:
Select Preferences → Remote Control → MIDI from the MADRIX menu bar.
The MIDI Remote Editor will open. Click Open... to open your MMRC file.
